question.title: ClassCastException with simple-jndi
question.body:
I'm using simple-jndi 0.25. I've got the following file jdbc/RCVCERMAPB/EnregistrementTracesApplicatives/default.properties

default.properties contains:

type=javax.sql.DataSource
driver=org.postgresql.Driver
url=jdbc:postgresql://172.25.94.30:5432/rspdb3
user=rcvcermapb_traceappli
password=rcvcermapb_traceappli

In the code, I call:

final DataSource dataSourceTA = (DataSource) GestionnaireConnexionJndi.getInstance()
        .rechercherObjet( "jdbc/RCVCERMAPB/EnregistrementTracesApplicatives" );

which calls

Object objetObtenu = contexte.lookup("jdbc/RCVCERMAPB/EnregistrementTracesApplicatives");

I get the following error:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ClassCastException: class org.osjava.sj.jndi.MemoryContext cannot be cast to class javax.sql.DataSource (org.osjava.sj.jndi.MemoryContext is in unnamed module of loader 'app'; javax.sql.DataSource is in module java.sql of loader 'platform')

What causes this and how do I fix it?
